sub_topic: Probability of rolling a certain number on a dice
message_1: What is the probability of rolling a 6 on a fair standard six-sided dice?
message_2: The probability of rolling a 6 on a fair standard six-sided dice is 1/6, as there is one favorable outcome (rolling a 6) out of six possible outcomes (rolling a 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6).
